SEARCH

Class Enquiry

java.lang.Object
Enquiry
Direct Known Subclasses:
Suggestion
public class Enquiry extends Object
The Enquiry class represents the enquiry sent from student to camp committee or staff. The Enquiry will be specific to each camp. The student can submit the enquiry, view their enquiry, delete their enquiry. The camp committee can view all enquiries submitted by all students, and reply to the student's enquiry. The Enquiry will also holds the date information of when it is submitted, updated, and replied.

  • Constructor Details

    • Enquiry

      public Enquiry(int ID, String stringValue, String submittedBy, Date submittedOn, Date updatedOn, int campID)
      Constructor for the Enquiry object (new empty Enquiry)
      Parameters:
      ID - The ID of the enquiry
      stringValue - The String message of the enquiry
      submittedBy - The userID of the user submitting the enquiry
      submittedOn - The Date of the enquiry submission
      updatedOn - The Date of the last enquiry update
      campID - The ID of the camp this enquiry is sent to

    • Enquiry

      public Enquiry(int ID, String stringValue, String submittedBy, Date submittedOn, String reply, String repliedBy, Date repliedOn, Date updatedOn, int campID)
      Constructor for the Enquiry object (from the database)
      Parameters:
      ID - The ID of the enquiry
      stringValue - The String message of the enquiry
      submittedBy - The userID of the user submitting the enquiry
      submittedOn - The Date of the enquiry submission
      reply - The reply message to this enquiry
      repliedBy - The userID of the camp committee replying to this enquiry.
      repliedOn - The Date when the reply was made
      updatedOn - The Date of the last enquiry update
      campID - The ID of the camp this enquiry is sent to

  • Method Details

    • edit

      public void edit(String newString)
      Edits the enquiry message. The student will not be able to edit the enquiry that is already processed. The updateOn attributes will be updated.
      Parameters:
      newString - The new enquiry message.

    • isProcessed

      public boolean isProcessed()
      Returns A boolean indicating whether the Enquiry has been processed.
      Returns:
      boolean

    • reply

      public void reply(String reply, String repliedBy, Date repliedOn)
      Make a reply to this enquiry
      Parameters:
      reply - The reply message
      repliedBy - The userID of the camp committee that makes a reply
      repliedOn - The Date when the reply is made
